attributes.action: call a general election before the 2009 summer recess.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request the Prime Minister to ask the Queen to dissolve parliament immediately, in order that at the following general election all MPs may be called to account by their electorate for their use or abuse of allowances.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
